amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Women, Infants and Children Farmers Market Nutrition Program by $5 million offset by a reduction in the Departmental Administration account by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the Farmers Market Nutrition Program by $5 million offset by a reduction in the Departmental Administration account by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clarke (MI) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
